rules_text:
Players can’t gain life this turn. Damage can’t be prevented this turn. Choose one –
• Overcook deals 2 damage to target player.
• Overcook deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
notes:
Added art
Reworked ability — Loved the original, but we do need a red way to stop lifegain, and this should still get similar flavor across.

Revise — so many words added for such a slight distinction between abilities.
